usefulItems: baking trays and baking paper, wire rack, oven
title: Quinoa and Carrot Bites

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 170°C and line two baking trays with baking paper.
Place walnuts in mixing bowl and chop <b>1 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a small bowl and set aside.
Place carrots in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add almond butter, maple syrup, banana, vanilla and egg then mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add quinoa flakes, oats, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt then mix <b>20 sec//speed 3<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add reserved chopped walnuts then mix <b>20 sec//speed 3<b>. Drop 2 Tbsp mixture onto prepared trays, leaving 5 cm gap between each. Bake for 15-18 minutes (170°C) until cooked and golden.
Leave to cool on trays for 2 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. Serve at room temperature.

hintsAndTricks: Makes a good 'breakfast-on-the-go' option or a quick snack at any time of day.
Best eaten fresh, or store in an airtight container for up to <b>3 days.<b>
